thread.title: Monaco midfielder Tiemoue Bakayoko ready to snub Chelsea and Manchester United in favour of PSG
thread.title_full: Monaco midfielder Tiemoue Bakayoko ready to snub Chelsea and Manchester United in favour of PSG

author: Darren Lewis
title: Monaco midfielder Tiemoue Bakayoko ready to snub Chelsea and Manchester United in favour of PSG
text:
Sport Monaco midfielder Tiemoue Bakayoko ready to snub Chelsea and Manchester United in favour of PSG The £40million-rated 22-year-old is determined not to reject the French champions a second time after turning them down as a teenager Share Monaco's Tiemoue Bakayoko in action with David Silva (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Share Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
Monaco midfielder Tiemoue Bakayoko is ready to snub interest from Chelsea and Manchester United in favour of a move to PSG. 
The £40million-rated 22-year-old is determined not to reject the French champions a second time after turning them down as a teenager. 
Chelsea chiefs have had Bakayoko watched and boss Antonio Conte is ready to try and lure the player to Stamford Bridge this summer. 
But, explaining his preference for PSG, Bakayoko said: “I had a trial in an international tournament in Nîmes and we played against Arsenal. Bakayoko is keen on a move to PSG, rather than England (Photo: AFP/Getty) 
“The opportunity to sign for the PSG youth academy presented itself. But my dad and my brother chose Rennes, the best youth academy at the time. 
“Not going to PSG hurt me, I even had tears in my eyes. 
“So if the opportunity presents itself, I will not refuse a move to PSG. But I am only 22, and I feel very good at Monaco.” Like us on Facebook
